concept.title: AirClassroom Guide

conbody.p: Hello! This AirClassroom Guide will cover every aspect of AirClassroom in Shanks Hall. If you choose to rent a classroom in Shanks Hall via AirClassroom, you will have access to multiple projectors, updated Mac computers with a variety of applications, comfortable chairs, natural lighting, and handicap accessibility.
